attributes.action: get the petition checking staff to do a full day's work for a full day's pay, and expidite publication of petitions, instead of petitions appearing well after the time they were created. If the Prime Minister takes this petition site seriously, he will do something about its efficiency... OK, I realise that efficiency and the Labour Government are anathema, totally contradictory, and should never be used within the same sentence! I rest my case!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petitions placed a week of more ago are still not available to vote upon. The 'team' should get rid of the idiot petitions, and spend their time publishing petitions that actually mean something to society!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
